Hero.otsikko3: Machine learning and data science student

About.about1: I'm a master's student in computer science at Aalto University, majoring in Machine Learning, Data Science and Artificial intelligence, with a bachelor's degree in bioinformation technology.
About.about2: My background combines data analysis, machine learning and information visualization. These skills allow me to turn raw data into understandable insights. I enjoy working on problems where data, technology and human needs meet, that is from analytical dashboards to intelligent applications.
About.about3: I'm passionate about continuous learning and developing new skills, as demonstrated by my enthusiasm for new opportunities when they arise. I consider myself to be highly adaptive and efficient learning individuaI. I have the ability to work with a variety of personalities and can easily read the room.
About.about4: I am currently looking for a
About.about6: where I can apply data science and machine learning to real-world problems in industry or research.
